name: Epsom Salt Soak Peppermint, Tea Tree and Eucalyptus (250g)
description:
*All Natural*

Just dissolve a spoon of these refreshing and moisturising salts to some warm water and enjoy soaking your feet. 

With an all natural bled of Dead Sea Salts, Cocoa Butter and Avocado Oils with Peppermint, Tea Tree and Eucalyptus Essential Oils, your feet will feel fresh and fantastic. 

INGREDIENTS:Epsom Salt (Magnesium Sulphate), Milk (Lac), Corn Flour (Zea Mays), Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Almond Oil Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, entha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Linalool*, d-Limonene*, Geraniol*. Found naturally in Essential Oil*.

name: Whipped Shea Butter with Jojoba and Almond Oils (320ml)
description:
*All Natural*

This intensive whipped moisturiser comes in a large 320ml ceramic pot that will last for ages. It's gentle enough to be used all over the body, hands, feet and face. Rub the butter into your hands and spread on over your body as you like. 

It absorbs to leave the skin feeling silky smooth. 


Suitable for vegans.

Unscented
INGREDIENTS: Shea Butter (butyrospermum parkii fruit), Jojoba Oil (simmondsia chinensis seed oil), Almond Oil (prunus amygdalus dulcis).

Natural Lemon & Patchouli
INGREDIENTS: Shea Butter (butyrospermum parkii fruit), Jojoba Oil (simmondsia chinensis seed oil), Almond Oil (prunus amygdalus dulcis), Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Peel Oil, Pogostemon Cablin (Patchouli) Oil, Citral*, Limonene*. Naturally found in essential oils*. . 


Always free from:
SLS (Sodium Lauryl Sulphate)
SLES (Sodium Laureth Sulphate)
Palm Oil
Petrochemicals
Parabens
Artificial Preservatives
Artificial Colours

name: Lavender and Chamomile Moisturising Epsom Bath
description:
*All Natural*

Take a luxuriously moisturising and relaxing bath will all natural lavender, chamomile, Epsom and Milk Bath. 

Just add the infusion bag to a warm bath and allow the goodness to flow into the water. 

Made for silky smooth feeling skin without having to clean up the botanicals afterwards. 

INGREDIENTS: Epsom Salt (Magnesium Sulphate), Milk (lac),  Cornflour (Â zea mays flour), goat milk,  Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower, chamomilla recutita (matricaria) flower, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Essential Oil. Geraniol*, Linalool*, Limonene*. Naturally found in essential oils*

name: Moisturising Milk Bombs! (Min 110g)
description:
*All Naturally Scented*

Our take on the ever popular bath bomb. 

Less fizzing chemicals and more moisturising Cocoa Butter made with real milk and all natural essenatial oil fragrances. 

Happy Tree Moisturising Milk Bombs, disperse in a warm bath by fizzing gently and infuse your bath with all over moisturising goodness.
